means: [地名] [美国] 温斯顿-塞勒姆

sentence.Network_en: Winston - Salem has had an unusual commitment to the arts.
sentence.Network_cn: 温斯顿 - 塞勒姆对艺术有一种不寻常的贡献.

sentence.Network_en: The owners of Salem Funerals & Cremations, based in Winston - Salem , can relate to that.
sentence.Network_cn: 这影射了在 Winston -Salem 的Salem殡葬 火化公司.

sentence.Network_en: All samples after the proto approval will be sent to Winston - Salem unless specifically requested.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的样品经过批准后将会被运送到Winston-Salem除非有另行要求.
